item.description:
Callahan State Park in Framingham, south entrance paking lot (Millwood St)

Here are the details:

820-acre day use area located in Northwest Framingham. Callahan has seven miles of marked trails and is used for activities including fishing, hiking, horseback riding and cross-country skiing. Within the park are nearly 100 acres of open fields, 70 acres of which are currently under an agricultural lease.

Park Directions
Callahan State Park is located west of Boston, in east-central Massachusetts.


From East or west: Rt. 9 west to Rt. 30 exit, right at first set of lights to Edgell Road to Belknap Road (left), right onto Millwood Street to entrance on left across from golf course.

http://www.mass.gov/d...


Lunch afterwards at Chef Orient, Japanese & Chinese food recommended by Carol
thanks Carol!

1583 Worcester Rd (Rte 9)
Framingham Ma 01701
508-628-9227

www.cheforientrestaurant.com
item.name: Callahan State Park - Framingham
